Reviews.Title: Accessory bag
Reviews.Author: Benjamin antonetty
Reviews.Content: The bag fits over the camera fine but the battery charger was a little confusing. After charging a battery for seven hours it was still drained. Apparently, the battery and charger have to sit just wright in order to get the prongs to touch, you have to be careful of that. If the improved the charger I would have given it higher ratings

Reviews.Title: Excellent produtct!
Reviews.Author: adetomas
Reviews.Content: When we bought this camera we had some believes that the promises would not be fullfilled because, the description was precise but we thought it was a little bit exagerated...Our great suprise is that the camera exceededour expecations and it is doing everything they promise and more...Great product, excelletn optical zoom, better quality and easy to connect to share your memories...We are delighted!

Reviews.Title: Comentario
Reviews.Author: Adriana Alcívar
Reviews.Content: Es ideal para viajes largos tener una reserva o poder cargar tu cámara en tu vehículo y seguir disfrutando de los recuerdos

Reviews.Title: Excelente!!! Vendedor
Reviews.Author: jorge
Reviews.Content: 100% recomendado muy útil mi kit ademas de que la pila es necesaria para viajes y campamentos dónde no tengas donde cargar

Reviews.Title: review camera case
Reviews.Author: Michael C. Hanika
Reviews.Content: The case is almost too small for the camera.  Have to struggle to get the camera zipped in.  Otherwise OK.

Reviews.Title: Great customer service
Reviews.Author: Hilary Gwisdala
Reviews.Content: I received this accessory kit within days of purchase - and it was great to have the wall and car charger for my camera, as it only had come with a short cord to charge from the camera to the wall. The initial battery had an issue, but I called East Coast Photo and they quickly sent me a replacement at no charge. The new battery worked perfect and now I'm all set to take my camera on long trips. I only gave this four stars because the camera case itself is a bit tight, but it works fine and is of good quality.

Reviews.Title: Don't bother
Reviews.Author: Ron
Reviews.Content: The "case" is too small to even fit the camera.  So it is totally useless.  The battery charger is a car charger only, but inconveniently comes with a US to European plug adapter (totally useless and borderline dangerous) that doesn't even go with the charger. The battery is the only thing that might be functional, but it is the cheapest possible make.  Just don't bother with the set of products.  Buy a case that actually fits, a battery charger that is usable and why the heck it has the US to European adapter plus (that again won't work with the charger as it is only a car charger) I don't know... Wow, what a totally useless package.  I'd return it if the value of my time to do so wasn't worth more than the $27...DO NOT BUY!!!!

Reviews.Title: nice kit
Reviews.Author: Bocker
Reviews.Content: Nice accessories. I feel the bang for the buck was pretty good. Nice to have anextra battery.The case is a bit cheap but all in all it was a good value.

ProductInfo.Name: Samsung WB850F Digital Camera Accessory Kit includes: SDC-22 Case, SDSLB10A Battery, SDM-1501 Charger
